solution_line_template: First find the total number of clarinet and trumpet players: {num_trumpets} players + {num_clarinets} players = <<{num_trumpets}+{num_clarinets}={total_trumpet_clarinet_players}>>{total_trumpet_clarinet_players} players

Then find the total weight of the trumpets and clarinets: {total_trumpet_clarinet_players} players * {weight_per_trumpet_clarinet} pounds/player = <<{total_trumpet_clarinet_players}*{weight_per_trumpet_clarinet}={total_trumpet_clarinet_weight}>>{total_trumpet_clarinet_weight} pounds

Then find the total weight of the trombones: {num_trombones} players * {weight_per_trombone} pounds/player = <<{num_trombones}*{weight_per_trombone}={total_trombone_weight}>>{total_trombone_weight} pounds
Then find the total weight of the tubas: {num_tubas} players * {weight_per_tuba} pounds/player = <<{num_tubas}*{weight_per_tuba}={total_tuba_weight}>>{total_tuba_weight} pounds
Then find the total weight of the drummers: {num_drummers} drummers * {weight_per_drummer} pounds/player = <<{num_drummers}*{weight_per_drummer}={total_drummer_weight}>>{total_drummer_weight} pounds

Then add the weight of each type of instrument to find the total weight: {total_trumpet_clarinet_weight} pounds + {total_trombone_weight} pounds + {total_tuba_weight} pounds + {total_drummer_weight} pounds = <<{total_trumpet_clarinet_weight}+{total_trombone_weight}+{total_tuba_weight}+{total_drummer_weight}={total_weight}>>{total_weight} pounds
